Fitkora Quality Neoprene Gym Gloves

Protection

Fitkora Gym Gloves protect against blisters and calluses, reducing pain while increasing gain.

Made of 100% quality Neoprene for maximum grip. Compare to leather gloves, which easily slip on equipment.

One size fits all hands - easy on, easy off!

Lightweight, comfortable, and breathable. Gloves eliminate sweat and odor.

Great for Crossfit, weightlifting, exercising, pullups, dumbbells, kettlebells, deadlifts. Lifetime moneyback guarantee on all orders!

Reviews

Here's what our customers have to say...

I really enjoy the Fitkora workout gloves, I have been working out for over a decade and these gloves have the best grip. They slide easily into your fingers all the while giving you protection from callouses. Fitkora has done a great job not enclosing the whole hand with the glove so your hands don't sweat and smell after working out. These workout gloves are also easy to tag along in your gym bag without taking up space and making your gym bag odorous. Fitkora gloves are competitively priced and good for both sexes and beginners/athletes. I've used traditional workout gloves in the past, even ones with wrist straps and they always seem to be a hassle and smell. The grip on traditional workout gloves is not as good as the Fitkora workout gloves. I highly recommend Fitkora workout gloves and continue to enjoy mine.
